Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the match by eight wickets
Joe Root was dismissed by a run-out, marking the fourth time he was out in such a partnership
Ben Stokes scored 43 runs from 73 balls, hitting six fours
Pre-Game Insights: England made three changes to their squad, including returning players Liam Livingstone, Chris Woakes, and Moeen Ali
Sri Lanka brought back Angelo Mathews and Lahiru Kumara to their squad
Post-Match Reflections: The win gave Sri Lanka a boost in their World Cup campaign
England's loss effectively ended their defense of the World Cup title
Miscellaneous Highlights: England scored their lowest all-out total in an ODI in Bengaluru
Sri Lanka has won all their last five World Cup matches against England
